version_description: Welcome to Shorland, a nation where combat prowess determines the value of a man, and in which only the best can call themselves knights. Will you manage to join their ranks, or will you fall in your first duel? Hold your sword true and find out.

Welcome to Shorland, a nation where combat prowess determines the value of a man, and in which only the best can call themselves knights. Will you manage to join their ranks, or will you fall in your first duel? Hold your sword true and find out.
Fixed some of the game issues reported by our Knights
Fixed some of the game issues reported by our Knights

The King has decided to grant land and a castle to every knight who can meet his requirements.
With your new castle, you can:
- Customize your throne room (and sit on it)
- Create your own coat of arms (show it to your opponents in duels)
- Build up your lands to become a powerful lord: erect a village to generate silver coins and build up a mine to mint gold coins

The King has decided to grant land and a castle to every knight who can meet his requirements.
With your new castle, you can:
- Customize your throne room (and sit on it)
- Create your own coat of arms (show it to your opponents in duels)
- Build up your lands to become a powerful lord: erect a village to generate silver coins and build up a mine to mint gold coins
Our knights went on a journey and performed general improvements and bugfixes!
Our knights went on a journey and performed general improvements and bugfixes!
Our brave knights went on a quest to improve performance and defeat bugs and came back victorious!
Our brave knights went on a quest to improve performance and defeat bugs and came back victorious!
